hotspots.label: Wrinkled Head
hotspots.fact: This bird's head has loose, wrinkled skin that helps it stay clean while eating messy food. The wrinkles can expand and contract, kind of like an accordion!

hotspots.label: Powerful Wings
hotspots.fact: These large black wings help vultures soar high in the sky for hours without flapping. They ride warm air currents called thermals to search for food below.

hotspots.label: Strong Gray Legs
hotspots.fact: Vultures have thick, powerful legs built for walking on the ground. Their feet are flat and not as sharp as eagles' talons because they don't need to catch live prey.

hotspots.label: All Black Feathers
hotspots.fact: The dark black feathers help vultures absorb heat from the sun, which gives them energy to fly. Dark colors also help them blend in while flying high overhead.
